trans-unit.source: The abstract base class from which all durable service persistence providers are derived.
trans-unit.target: 從中衍生所有長期服務持續性提供者的抽象基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Users can create classes derived from this type to create durable service persistence providers that use custom persistence stores, such as third-party databases, the file system, or storage systems accessed remotely.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以建立衍生自這個類型建立使用自訂持續性存放區，例如協力廠商資料庫、 檔案系統或從遠端存取的儲存系統的長期服務持續性提供者的類別。

trans-unit.source: To create a system-provided implementation of this type that uses Microsoft SQL Server as a persistence store, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory>.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立使用 Microsoft SQL Server 持續性存放區作為此類型的系統提供實作，請參閱<xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When creating persistence provider implementations, it is important to maintain the thread's original identity in the new provider's methods (such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider.Load%2A>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 時建立持續性提供者實作，請務必維護新的提供者方法 （例如<xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider.Load%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider.Load%2A>執行緒的原始身分識別

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, security loopholes could be created, because operations would then run under the wrong identity.
trans-unit.target: 否則安全性漏洞時無法建立，因為作業可能會執行在錯誤的身分識別。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，初始化新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the service state data being saved.
trans-unit.target: 已儲存的服務狀態資料的唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, represents the beginning of the Create phase.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，代表 「 建立 」 階段的開始。

trans-unit.source: The Create phase occurs when service instance records are first created in the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 當服務執行個體記錄首次在持續性存放區中建立時，就會發生 「 建立 」 階段。

trans-unit.source: The actual instance state.
trans-unit.target: 實際的執行個體的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The time period after which the persistence provider aborts this attempt.
trans-unit.target: 一段時間之後的持續性提供者會中止這次嘗試。

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: 要在作業完成時呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous operation from other operations.
trans-unit.target: 使用者提供的物件，可區別這個特定非同步作業與其他作業。

trans-unit.source: The state of the BeginCreate asynchronous method call.
trans-unit.target: BeginCreate 非同步方法呼叫的狀態。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, represents the beginning of the Delete phase.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，代表 「 刪除 」 階段的開始。

trans-unit.source: The Delete phase occurs when service state data is permanently deleted from the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 從持續性存放區永久刪除服務狀態資料時，就會發生 「 刪除 」 階段。

trans-unit.source: The actual instance state.
trans-unit.target: 實際的執行個體的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The time period after which the persistence provider aborts this attempt.
trans-unit.target: 一段時間之後的持續性提供者會中止這次嘗試。

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: 要在作業完成時呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous operation from other operations.
trans-unit.target: 使用者提供的物件，可區別這個特定非同步作業與其他作業。

trans-unit.source: The state of the BeginDelete asynchronous method call.
trans-unit.target: BeginDelete 非同步方法呼叫的狀態。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, represents the beginning of the Load phase.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，代表 「 載入 」 階段的開始。

trans-unit.source: The Load phase occurs when state data is loaded into the persistence provider from the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 狀態資料載入至持續性存放區從持續性提供者時，就會發生 「 載入 」 階段。

trans-unit.source: The time period after which the persistence provider aborts this attempt.
trans-unit.target: 一段時間之後的持續性提供者會中止這次嘗試。

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: 要在作業完成時呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous operation from other operations.
trans-unit.target: 使用者提供的物件，可區別這個特定非同步作業與其他作業。

trans-unit.source: The state of the BeginLoad asynchronous method call.
trans-unit.target: BeginLoad 非同步方法呼叫的狀態。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, represents the beginning of the LoadIfChanged phase.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，代表 LoadIfChanged 階段的開始。

trans-unit.source: The LoadIfChanged phase occurs when state data is loaded into the persistence provider from the persistence store, and the state data in the persistence store has been changed.
trans-unit.target: 狀態資料載入至持續性存放區中，從持續性提供者和已變更的持續性存放區中的狀態資料時，就會發生 LoadIfChanged 階段。

trans-unit.source: The time period after which the persistence provider aborts this attempt.
trans-unit.target: 一段時間之後的持續性提供者會中止這次嘗試。

trans-unit.source: The token returned by a previous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider.Create*> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider.Update*> that represents the current state held by the caller.
trans-unit.target: 先前傳回的權杖<> *> 或<> *>，代表呼叫端所持有的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: 要在作業完成時呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous operation from other operations.
trans-unit.target: 使用者提供的物件，可區別這個特定非同步作業與其他作業。

trans-unit.source: The state of the BeginLoadIfChanged asynchronous method call.
trans-unit.target: BeginLoadIfChanged 非同步方法呼叫的狀態。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, represents the beginning of the Update phase.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，代表 「 更新 」 階段的開始。

trans-unit.source: The Update phase occurs when service state data is updated in the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 持續性存放區中更新服務狀態資料時，就會發生 「 更新 」 階段。

trans-unit.source: The actual instance state.
trans-unit.target: 實際的執行個體的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The time period after which the persistence provider aborts this attempt.
trans-unit.target: 一段時間之後的持續性提供者會中止這次嘗試。

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: 要在作業完成時呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous operation from other operations.
trans-unit.target: 使用者提供的物件，可區別這個特定非同步作業與其他作業。

trans-unit.source: The state of the BeginUpdate asynchronous method call.
trans-unit.target: BeginUpdate 非同步方法呼叫的狀態。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, creates a service state record in the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，會建立持續性存放區服務狀態記錄。

trans-unit.source: The actual instance state.
trans-unit.target: 實際的執行個體的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The time period after which the persistence provider aborts this attempt.
trans-unit.target: 一段時間之後的持續性提供者會中止這次嘗試。

trans-unit.source: The instance token corresponding to the state just saved.
trans-unit.target: 對應至剛儲存之狀態執行個體的語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: This can be passed to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider.LoadIfChanged*> to determine whether the state in the persistence store differs from the state when Create was called.
trans-unit.target: 這可以傳遞至<xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider.LoadIfChanged*>以判斷建立 」 呼叫時是否持續性存放區中的狀態不同狀態。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider.LoadIfChanged*>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, permanently deletes service state information from the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，永久刪除服務狀態資訊從持續性存放區。

trans-unit.source: The actual instance state.
trans-unit.target: 實際的執行個體的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The time period after which the persistence provider aborts this attempt.
trans-unit.target: 一段時間之後的持續性提供者會中止這次嘗試。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, represents the end of the Create phase.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，代表 「 建立 」 階段的結尾。

trans-unit.source: The Create phase occurs when service state records are first created in the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 服務狀態記錄首次在持續性存放區中建立時，就會發生 「 建立 」 階段。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the result of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 運算結果的參考。

trans-unit.source: The instance token corresponding to the state just saved.
trans-unit.target: 對應至剛儲存之狀態執行個體的語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: This can be passed to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider.LoadIfChanged*> to determine whether the state in the persistence store differs from the state when Create was called.
trans-unit.target: 這可以傳遞至<xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider.LoadIfChanged*>以判斷建立 」 呼叫時是否持續性存放區中的狀態不同狀態。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider.LoadIfChanged*>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, represents the end of the Delete phase.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，代表 「 刪除 」 階段的結尾。

trans-unit.source: The Delete phase occurs when state data is permanently deleted from the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 狀態資料從持續性存放區永久刪除時，就會發生 「 刪除 」 階段。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the result of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 運算結果的參考。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, represents the end of the Load phase.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，代表 「 載入 」 階段的結尾。

trans-unit.source: The Load phase occurs when state data is loaded into the persistence provider from the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 狀態資料載入至持續性存放區從持續性提供者時，就會發生 「 載入 」 階段。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the result of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 運算結果的參考。

trans-unit.source: The service state information.
trans-unit.target: 服務狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, represents the end of the LoadIfChanged phase.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，代表 LoadIfChanged 階段的結束。

trans-unit.source: The LoadIfChanged phase occurs when state data is loaded into the persistence provider from the persistence store, and the state data in the persistence store has been changed.
trans-unit.target: 狀態資料載入至持續性存放區中，從持續性提供者和已變更的持續性存放區中的狀態資料時，就會發生 LoadIfChanged 階段。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the result of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 運算結果的參考。

trans-unit.source: The actual instance state.
trans-unit.target: 實際的執行個體的狀態。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the instance <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> parameter has been set with the latest copy from the persistence store; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the locally cached state is already up-to-date.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果執行個體<xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref>從持續性存放區; 參數設定的最新的複本<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果本機快取的狀態已經是最新狀態。

trans-unit.source: Represents the end of the Update phase.
trans-unit.target: 代表 「 更新 」 階段結束。

trans-unit.source: The Update phase occurs when service state records are updated in the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 在持續性存放區中更新服務狀態記錄時，就會發生 「 更新 」 階段。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the result of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 運算結果的參考。

trans-unit.source: The instance token corresponding to the state just saved.
trans-unit.target: 對應至剛儲存之狀態執行個體的語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: This can be passed to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider.LoadIfChanged*> to determine whether the state in the persistence store differs from the state when Create was called.
trans-unit.target: 這可以傳遞至<xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider.LoadIfChanged*>以判斷建立 」 呼叫時是否持續性存放區中的狀態不同狀態。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider.LoadIfChanged*>

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref:System.Guid> associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 代表<xref:System.Guid>與這個執行個體相關聯。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The GUID associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 與這個執行個體相關聯的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, loads service state information from the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，請從持續性存放區中載入服務狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the security token in the Load method, if not reverted, stay in effect for the remainder of that message's processing.
trans-unit.target: 變更載入方法中的安全性權杖，如果未還原時，保持作用中處理該訊息的其餘部分。

trans-unit.source: This means that the service operation's user code, the response message path through the dispatcher, as well as any error paths, run in the changed security context.
trans-unit.target: 這表示服務作業的使用者程式碼、 透過發送器的回應訊息路徑，以及任何錯誤路徑，在執行變更的安全性內容。

trans-unit.source: The time period after which the persistence provider aborts this attempt.
trans-unit.target: 一段時間之後的持續性提供者會中止這次嘗試。

trans-unit.source: The loaded instance state.
trans-unit.target: 載入的執行個體的狀態。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, loads service state information from the persistence store if that data has been changed.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，載入服務狀態資訊從持續性存放區若該資料已變更。

trans-unit.source: The time period after which the persistence provider aborts this attempt.
trans-unit.target: 一段時間之後的持續性提供者會中止這次嘗試。

trans-unit.source: The token returned by a previous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider.Create*> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider.Update*>, which represents the current state held by the caller.
trans-unit.target: 先前傳回的權杖<> *> 或<> *>，表示呼叫端所持有的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: The actual instance state.
trans-unit.target: 實際的執行個體的狀態。

trans-unit.source: if the instance parameter has been set with the latest copy from the persistence store; if the locally cached state is already up to date.
trans-unit.target: 如果 instance 從持續性存放區; 參數設定的最新的複本 如果本機快取的狀態已經是最新狀態。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, updates service state records in the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，更新的服務狀態記錄的持續性存放區中。

trans-unit.source: The actual instance state.
trans-unit.target: 實際的執行個體的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The time period after which the persistence provider aborts this attempt.
trans-unit.target: 一段時間之後的持續性提供者會中止這次嘗試。

trans-unit.source: The instance token corresponding to the state just saved.
trans-unit.target: 對應至剛儲存之狀態執行個體的語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: This can be passed to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider.LoadIfChanged*> to determine whether the state in the persistence store differs from the state when Create was called.
trans-unit.target: 這可以傳遞至<xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider.LoadIfChanged*>以判斷建立 」 呼叫時是否持續性存放區中的狀態不同狀態。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider.LoadIfChanged*>
